featureIPFSDesc: Unlike traditional cloud notepads, it saves work to the decentralized web. Censorship-resistant and globally accessible.
featureLegacyDesc: Emphasizes long-term preservation. Save thoughts or "time capsules" to be discovered by future generations.

featureHistoryDesc: Maintains automatic backups and a deep event log of every character change. Travel back in time.
featurePrivacyDesc: Private by default. Only accessible via unique, hidden links unless you choose to publish.
featureAccountFreeDesc: Start writing and saving to the permanent web immediately without needing to create an account.
faqA1: Unlike standard notepads, Textpad combines a high-end visual editor with decentralized storage (IPFS) and professional publishing tools. It's built for permanence.
faqA2: Yes. When you choose to save via IPFS, your document is launched to the permanent web. This ensures your content remains accessible even if central servers go down.
faqQ3: Can I use it as a blog?
faqA3: Absolutely. You can turn any note into a professional blog post on a custom subdomain (e.g., name.textpad.cloud) with one click.
faqA4: Until you choose to publish, documents are private by default and only accessible via a unique link. We don't index your private drafts.
faqA5: Local storage and standard cloud saving are unlimited for text. For heavy media and IPFS permanence, we provide a robust solution for your lifework.
faqQ6: What can I use Textpad for?
faqA6: Textpad is versatile, from quick notes to professional writing. Whether you need a simple pad or a permanent digital archive, Textpad scales with you.
